practiceAreas: Motor Vehicle Accidents|Trip and Fall|Negligent Security|Personal Injury|Wrongful Death|Medical Malpractice|Professional Malpractice|Premises Liability
description:
Tried, True, and Trusted: The team at Williams | Elleby, in Kennesaw, Georgia, has a reputation for securing top-dollar awards in personal injury cases. The law firm has recovered millions of dollars on behalf of clients who have suffered in incidents such as the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Negligent Security
  • Slip and falls
  • Professional Liability

Following a free initial consultation, the attorneys at the law firm quickly get to work determining the damages a client has experienced and how the defendant’s negligence was responsible for that harm. They are thorough in both their approach and execution. Leaving no stone unturned, they work with medical professionals, law enforcement officers and other key players to unearth evidence supporting a client’s claim.

In mediation or litigation, the attorneys prove to be a formidable foe. They have been listed as a Rising Star by Super Lawyers; earned an Avvo “Superb” rating; been listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40 and The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; and received the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys’ 10 Best Client Satisfaction Award.

More importantly, however, the attorneys at the law firm help people navigate some of the most difficult moments of their lives. They have the ability to switch gears from being relentless lawyers in a courtroom to being compassionate confidants for clients.
